items.title: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (JPM): Among Value Stocks in Ken Fisher’s Portfolio
items.description: We recently published a list of 10 Value Stocks in Ken Fisher’s Portfolio. In this article, we are going to take a look at where JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) stands against other value stocks in Ken Fisher’s portfolio. Trump’s “stupid” tariffs will fail; that’s the sentiment echoed by billionaire investor Ken Fisher as their […]

items.title: Oil Traders Lurch From Praying for Volatility to Drowning in It
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Until recently, oil traders complained that it was almost impossible to wring profits out of a listless and rangebound crude market. After the events of the past two-and-a-half weeks, this may have been a case of “careful what you wish for.”Most Read from BloombergDOGE Visits National Gallery of Art to Discuss Museum’s Legal StatusTrump Administration Takes Over New York Penn Station RevampDOGE Places Entire Staff of Federal Homelessness Agency on LeaveTrump Signs Executive Orders
